biotools.summary: Algorithm to identify the gene targets of a drug treatment based on gene-expression data. In a typical use of the algorithm, a single expression profile, say obtained as a result of a treatment under study, is used as the test profile while a set of hundreds of expression profiles is used as the training set.

bioschemas.name: MNI
